General.Name: Ocean Glass Public Company Limited
General.Description: Ocean Glass Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and sale of dining table glassware under the Ocean, POSH, and Lucaris brands in Thailand and internationally. It also sells its products online. The company serves retail stores, companies, shops, governmental agencies, hotels, restaurant, and others. Ocean Glass Public Company Limited was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

1.Name: Mr. Veerasit  Pratuengsukpong
1.Title: Exec. Director of Account, Fin., Information Technology & Procurement
